name: Madoka and The Best University
statement: Madoka wants to enter to " Novosibirsk State University ", but in the entrance exam she came across a very difficult task: Given an integer $$$n$$$, it is required to calculate $$$\sum{\operatorname{lcm}(c, \gcd(a, b))}$$$, for all triples of positive integers $$$(a, b, c)$$$, where $$$a + b + c = n$$$. In this problem $$$\gcd(x, y)$$$ denotes the greatest common divisor of $$$x$$$ and $$$y$$$, and $$$\operatorname{lcm}(x, y)$$$ denotes the least common multiple of $$$x$$$ and $$$y$$$. Solve this problem for Madoka and help her to enter to the best university!
inputFormat: The first and the only line contains a single integer $$$n$$$ ($$$3 \le n \le 10^5$$$).
outputFormat: Print exactly one interger â€” $$$\sum{\operatorname{lcm}(c, \gcd(a, b))}$$$. Since the answer can be very large, then output it modulo $$$10^9 + 7$$$.
